text: One day Diogenes was asked where he wanted to be buried when he died. "I want to be left in the field", he replied. - How can I? Someone was present. You want to be eaten by birds and wild animals? - Let me have my stick so I can drive them away. - Run after them! - another person said. If you're dead, you won't feel anything. "Then", said Diogenes, "what does it matter if the birds eat me? FIN
title: Diógenes y la muerte
author: Heinrich von Kleist
